sentences.en: A constant threat of unemployment hangs over thousands of university researchers.
sentences.cn: 持续存在的失业威胁困扰着数千名大学科研人员。

sentences.en: Amy lived in constant fear of being attacked.
sentences.cn: 埃米一直生活在害怕遭到袭击的恐惧之中。

sentences.en: And so, this is constant.
sentences.cn: 因此，这是个常数。

sentences.en: Constant rain forced the abandonment of the next day's competitions.
sentences.cn: 连绵阴雨致使翌日各项赛事被迫中止。

sentences.en: Constant wheelchair use will scuff almost any floor surface.
sentences.cn: 任何地板上经常有轮椅走动几乎都会有所磨损。

sentences.en: Despite his constant protes-tations of devotion and love, her doubts persisted.
sentences.cn: 尽管他一直宣称对她的爱忠贞不渝，她仍然心存怀疑。

sentences.en: He has been her constant companion for the last four months.
sentences.cn: 4个月来，他一直陪伴在她身边。

sentences.en: He kept in constant contact with his family while he was in Australia.
sentences.cn: 他在澳大利亚时一直和家人保持着联系。

sentences.en: He would have a nurse in constant attendance day and night.
sentences.cn: 会有一位护士日夜不间断地陪护着他。

sentences.en: It's a constant struggle to try to keep them up to par.
sentences.cn: 要让他们达标，需要不断努力。

sentences.en: She could hear the constant rhythm of his breathing.
sentences.cn: 她能听见他均匀而有节奏的呼吸。

sentences.en: She has fought a constant battle with her weight.
sentences.cn: 她一直在竭力控制体重。

sentences.en: She suggests that women are under constant pressure to be abnormally thin.
sentences.cn: 她暗示说女性总是处在保持身材异常瘦削的压力之下。

sentences.en: The capital is still under constant bombardment by the rebel forces.
sentences.cn: 首都仍在遭受叛军的持续轰炸。

sentences.en: The dynamic of the market demands constant change and adjustment.
sentences.cn: 市场要有活力，需要不断地改变和调整。

sentences.en: The streets are wedged solid with near-constant traffic gridlock.
sentences.cn: 交通堵塞丝毫不见缓解，街道被堵得水泄不通。

sentences.en: The weather is a constant topic of conversation in Britain.
sentences.cn: 在英国，天气是交谈中永恒的话题。

sentences.en: There was a constant stream of visitors to the house.
sentences.cn: 参观这幢房子的游客川流不息。

sentences.en: There was constant jeering and interruption from the floor.
sentences.cn: 议员席上不断有人在嘲讽和打岔.

sentences.en: travelling at a constant speed
sentences.cn: 以恒定速度行驶

phrases.tran_cn: 恒流；定量流动；常廉流稳恒流；恒流定量消耗
恒速；固定比率；恒定流量

trans.tran_cn: 持续不断的，重复的，恒定的
trans.tran_en: happening regularly or all the time
a number or quantity that never changes
